mapper.select: select (select count(*) from tf_input where BT_PRD_BARCODE = #{barcode} and IN_STORE_CD = #{storeCd}) as inCnt, (select count(*) from tf_output where BT_PRD_BARCODE = #{barcode} and OUT_STORE_CD = #{storeCd} and substring(ST_OUT_TYPE,1,4) = '0602' ) as outCnt, (select count(*) from tf_output where BT_PRD_BARCODE = #{barcode} and OUT_STORE_CD = #{storeCd} and ST_OUT_TYPE = '060301' ) as stCnt, (select count(*) from tf_output where BT_PRD_BARCODE = #{barcode} and OUT_STORE_CD = #{storeCd} and ST_OUT_TYPE = '060302' ) as onCnt
select * from tf_stock ts where TF_PRD_BARCODE = #{item} limit 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tf_stock (STOCK_STORE_CD, STOCK_STORE_NM, TF_PRD_CD, TF_PRD_NM, TF_PRD_BARCODE, PRD_SIZE, CUR_STOCK_CNT, REAL_STOCK_CNT, STD_STOCK_CNT, RFID_STOCK_CNT, INVENTORY_CNT, REG_DATE, REG_ID) VALUES(#{STOCK_STORE_CD}, #{STOCK_STORE_NM}, #{TF_PRD_CD}, #{TF_PRD_NM}, #{TF_PRD_BARCODE}, #{PRD_SIZE}, #{CUR_STOCK_CNT}, #{REAL_STOCK_CNT}, #{STD_STOCK_CNT}, 0, 0, now(), #{userId})
mapper.select: select '' as '구입처', TF_PRD_CD as '자체상품코드', TF_PRD_NM as '상품명', PRD_SIZE as '단품', '' as '단품코드', TF_PRD_BARCODE as '바코드', '' as '로케이션', CUR_STOCK_CNT as '현재재고', REAL_STOCK_CNT as '실제재고', STD_STOCK_CNT as '적정재고', '' as '판매여부', '' as '쇼핑몰', '' as '재고조사', STOCK_STORE_NM as '배송처(창고)', RFID_STOCK_CNT as 'RFID재고' from tf_stock ts where STOCK_STORE_CD like '%${storeCd}%' order by STOCK_REG_SEQ ;
